name: Dr. Loop
description:
Dr. Loop is a very smart scientist and has created unimaginable gadgets.

A villain has stolen a very important invention from his laboratory and has to try to get it back. For this he has been equipped with an invention that allows him to go back in time and summon a ghost of himself by replicating his last movements.

Jump into the void and go back in your footsteps to use your ghost as a platform to propel you through the different platforms and help Dr. Loop to recover his great invention.

BASIC CONTROLS:

A/D: Move left/right

Space: Jump

The rest of the controls are explained in-game.
